PropertyDefinition.name: Applicable Categories
PropertyDefinition.description: List of categories to which this template applies

PropertyDefinition.name: Item CodeTypes
PropertyDefinition.description: CodeTypes to show in templated items. Those not in listed will be hidden.

PropertyDefinition.name: Item Properties
PropertyDefinition.description: Properties to show in templated items. Those not in listed will be hidden.

PropertyDefinition.name: View All Codes Order
PropertyDefinition.description: Preference list for primary code type, applicable to both category and item views.

PropertyDefinition.name: View All Metadata
PropertyDefinition.description: Metadata applicable to the both category and item views, e.g. icon.

PropertyDefinition.name: View Category Data Columns
PropertyDefinition.description: QL driven additional columns, applicable to category items view.

PropertyDefinition.name: View Category Metadata
PropertyDefinition.description: Metadata applicable to category items view, e.g. ShowPropCountColumn

PropertyDefinition.name: View Item Display Graphically
PropertyDefinition.description: List of properties to plot, applicable to item view.

PropertyDefinition.name: View Item Display Queries
PropertyDefinition.description: QL driven display values, applicable to item view.

PropertyDefinition.name: View Item Metadata
PropertyDefinition.description: Metadata to control the item view. These values only apply when template is incomplete. For future use: ShowEmptyProps, HideMarketData, HideReferenceData, MergeAll(to merge Reference Data, Market Data and Avail Props tabs), CollapseProps(to give focus

PropertyDefinition.name: View Item Tab Region Order
PropertyDefinition.description: Tab and region ordering, with descriptions, applicable to item view.

PropertyDefinition.name: End Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning end date of series to derive from, used in all tests.

PropertyDefinition.name: Object Calculations
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of object level calculations to run against universe.

PropertyDefinition.name: Series Calculations
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of single tenor point time series type calculations to run against universe.

PropertyDefinition.name: Start Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning start date of series to derive from, used in all tests.

PropertyDefinition.name: Universe Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] One or more queries that return a collection of items.

PropertyDefinition.name: Object Overrides
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of override rules for returning whole objects.

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Overrides
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of override rules for returning single points.

PropertyDefinition.name: Property Overrides
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of override rules for returning whole properties.

PropertyDefinition.name: Delegate
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Entity to handle exceptions, during public holiday of owning entity.

PropertyDefinition.name: End Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning end date of series to validate, used in all tests. If blank, date can be specified in Analytic Query column of test.

PropertyDefinition.name: Entity
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Owning entity.

PropertyDefinition.name: Object Tests
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of item level tests to run against universe.

PropertyDefinition.name: Property Actions
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of historic/series level actions to run against universe.

PropertyDefinition.name: Consolidation Action
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Consolidation action to perform on the configured Data Sources.

PropertyDefinition.name: Consolidation Action Data
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Data that qualifies the Consolidation Action.

PropertyDefinition.name: Consolidation Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning consolidation data date. Ignored for Static properties. Must be a valid QL+ date expresion. Eg. TODAY()-1 or '01/01/2001'.

PropertyDefinition.name: Data Source Output
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] The name of the Data Source of the consolidated value. If blank the chosen Data Source will be used.

PropertyDefinition.name: Data Sources
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] List of Data Sources for which to load data from the item as defined in Property.

PropertyDefinition.name: End Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning end date of series to consolidate, used in all tests.

PropertyDefinition.name: Property
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Property for which to load data from the item for each enabled Data Source defined in Data Sources.

PropertyDefinition.name: Property Data Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] The TimeScape data type of the item property in Property that is to be consolidated by this consolidation item.

PropertyDefinition.name: Start Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning start date of series to consolidate, used in all tests.

PropertyDefinition.name: Universe Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] One or more queries that return a collection of items.

PropertyDefinition.name: Calculation
PropertyDefinition.description: Derived Data Formula

PropertyDefinition.name: Copy of Calculation
PropertyDefinition.description: Derived Data Formula

PropertyDefinition.name: Enabled
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Flag to control if entity is active (in Process Management).

PropertyDefinition.name: SharePoint Entity Group
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Name of corresponding SharePoint group, containing all users in this entity, e.g. TimeScape Users London

PropertyDefinition.name: Entity ID
PropertyDefinition.description: Foreign key to TSPM

PropertyDefinition.name: Handler Type
PropertyDefinition.description: OutputFileExport, OutputReport, SendEmail

PropertyDefinition.name: Output File Export
PropertyDefinition.description: FileExportDefinitionXdb, FileExportDefinitionCode, FileExportDefinitionCodeType, Separator, DestinationFolder, FileName, etc

PropertyDefinition.name: Output Report
PropertyDefinition.description: ReportType (Checks, etc), DestinationFolder, FileName, NodeID, IncludeSubNodes, etc

PropertyDefinition.name: Send Email
PropertyDefinition.description: To, Cc, Bcc, SubjectTemplate, BodyTemplate, IsHtml, ReplacementTokens

PropertyDefinition.name: End Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning end date of series to data to output.

PropertyDefinition.name: Entity
PropertyDefinition.description: Owning Entity

PropertyDefinition.name: Property Outputs
PropertyDefinition.description: Property/DataSource pairs defining data to output, with optional de-normalisation query

PropertyDefinition.name: Series Outputs
PropertyDefinition.description: Property/DataSource pairs defining data to output, with optional de-normalisation query

PropertyDefinition.name: Start Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Expression returning start date of data to output.

PropertyDefinition.name: Universe Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] One or more queries that return a collection of items.

PropertyDefinition.description: Owning entity

PropertyDefinition.description: InputFilePath, InputFileSpec, LogFilePath, LogFilePrefix, ProcessedFilePath, RejectedFilePath, RowsInHeader, StartOfData, EndOfData, ColumnDelimiter, TextQualifier, EncodingCodePage

PropertyDefinition.description: Three or five text columns: LogicalColumnName, TargetProperty, NoDataTokenOpt [, RefDatabase][, RefCodeType]

PropertyDefinition.name: Target Mappings
PropertyDefinition.description: TargetCategory, TargetCategoryColumn, CodeColumn, SuffixedCodeFormat, CodeType, CodeTypeColumn, AdditionalCodeCol, AdditionalSuffixedCodeFormat, AdditionalCodeType, AdditionalCodeTypeCol, TargetDataSource, TargetDataSourceColumn, SaveDate, SaveDateC

Category.name: Mapping Tables
Category.description: General tables/lists for various mappings and lookups

PropertyDefinition.name: Table
PropertyDefinition.description: Mapping table

PropertyDefinition.name: Bloomberg Destination Properties
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] Target properties for fields from Get All Quotes

PropertyDefinition.name: Bloomberg Fields
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] For Get Data and Get History

PropertyDefinition.name: Bloomberg Identifiers Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] Query to load a collection of items, for Get Data (2 columns), Get All Quotes (3 columns) and Get History (3 columns)

PropertyDefinition.name: Bloomberg Save Date
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] Date (or date expression) used to save imported data

PropertyDefinition.name: Bloomberg Save Date Column
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] Column index to load save date from

PropertyDefinition.name: Bloomberg Save Date Format
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] Date format for parsing Bloomberg Save Date

PropertyDefinition.name: Data Interface
PropertyDefinition.description: Vendor interface/program name (TickHistoryTimeAndSales, GetData, GetAllQuotes, GetHistory)

PropertyDefinition.name: Data Vendor
PropertyDefinition.description: Data vendor name (Reuters, Bloomberg)

PropertyDefinition.name: End Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: Expression returning end date of data to request.

PropertyDefinition.name: Fields Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [RT] QL expression to load fields

PropertyDefinition.name: File Export Definition
PropertyDefinition.description: [BBG] Reference to File Export item to generate Bloomberg request file

PropertyDefinition.name: Items Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [RT] QL expression to load instruments

PropertyDefinition.name: Parameters Query
PropertyDefinition.description: [RT] QL expression to load parameters

PropertyDefinition.name: Start Date Query
PropertyDefinition.description: Expression returning start date of data to request.

PropertyDefinition.name: Unique File Name Identifier
PropertyDefinition.description: Six character asset class name, uses as part of request file name.
